yoruba: Ibi tí a fi ara sí lara ńgbé.
gold: Wherever one situates the body, there it inhabits.
gen: The Yoruba proverb "Ibi tí a fi ara sí lara ńgbé" translates to "Where one places oneself is where one will find comfort" in English. This proverb suggests that the choices we make about where we position ourselves in life determine our comfort and well-being.
